title: The Season
creator_credit: Donald MacDonald and Little Red Filmhouse
brief_description: The conflict between the innocence and commercialism of Christmas is illustrated by urban scenes of a parade featuring a spaceman and rollerskating donkey, the observations of an entrepreneur selling wildly colored trees, and the operation of a “Rent-a-Santa” service. This open-ended Academy Award nominated film allows the audience to form its own conclusions regarding the commercialization of a religious holiday.
